title: Garmin DriveSmart 65 with Traffic
description: The Garmin DriveSmart 65 with Traffic is an advanced GPS navigator designed to enhance your driving experience with cutting-edge features and real-time updates. Equipped with a large 6.95-inch high-resolution touchscreen display, this device offers clear, vibrant visuals and an intuitive interface for effortless navigation. The DriveSmart 65 comes preloaded with detailed maps of North America, ensuring you have access to comprehensive and up-to-date information on roads and routes. The device features real-time traffic updates via Garmin’s Traffic Receiver, which helps you avoid delays and find the fastest route to your destination. Advanced driver alerts, such as lane assist and speed limit notifications, provide timely information to help you stay safe on the road. Additionally, the DriveSmart 65 offers voice-activated navigation, allowing you to use hands-free commands for route planning and phone calls. The built-in Bluetooth feature enables hands-free calling and audio streaming, while the device’s compatibility with the Garmin Drive app offers access to additional features like live parking availability and weather updates. With its sleek design and advanced functionality, the Garmin DriveSmart 65 with Traffic is the ideal GPS solution for both daily commutes and long road trips.
key_features: 6.95-inch high-resolution touchscreen display
Preloaded North American maps
Real-time traffic updates with Garmin Traffic Receiver
Advanced driver alerts, including lane assist and speed limit notifications
Voice-activated navigation for hands-free operation
Bluetooth for hands-free calling and audio streaming
Garmin Drive app compatibility for live parking availability and weather updates
Free map updates for the lifetime of the device

meta_description: The Garmin DriveSmart 65 with Traffic offers a 6.95-inch high-resolution display, real-time traffic updates, advanced driver alerts, and hands-free calling. Ideal for both daily commutes and road trips with lifetime map updates.

title: Garmin DriveSmart 65 with Traffic
description: Upgrade your navigation experience with the Garmin DriveSmart 65 with Traffic, a premium GPS navigator that combines high-end features with user-friendly functionality. The device features a 6.95-inch high-resolution touchscreen display that provides clear and detailed maps for easy route planning. It comes with preloaded North American maps, giving you access to comprehensive navigation data for your travels. With real-time traffic updates delivered through the Garmin Traffic Receiver, you can avoid traffic jams and find the quickest route to your destination. The DriveSmart 65 includes advanced driver alerts like lane assist, which guides you through complex junctions, and speed limit notifications to keep you informed of current road regulations. The voice-activated navigation system allows for hands-free control, while the Bluetooth feature supports hands-free calling and audio streaming from your smartphone. The Garmin Drive app adds extra features like live parking information and weather updates. Whether you’re heading to a new city or just navigating your daily routes, the Garmin DriveSmart 65 with Traffic offers everything you need for a safe and efficient journey.
